channel.title: Posts on Rustem Islamov
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Rustem Islamov

item.title: Paper has been accpeted to ICML 2021
item.description: Our paper has been accepted to ICML 2021.

item.title: KAUST AI Conference
item.description: I have presented our recent work (Distributed Second Order Methods with Fast Rates and Compressed Communication), on KAUST Conference on Artificial Intelligence. The recorded video is available on YouTube.

item.title: Talk on the recent paper
item.description: Peter Richtárik has given a talk on our recent paper: Distributed Second Order Methods with Fast Rates and Compressed Communication. The recorded video will be available soon on YouTube channel of the seminar. In addition, I have presented the poster on the paper in Communication Efficient Distributed Optimization Workshop.

item.title: Internship in Optimization Lab
item.description: I have gotten one more internship at Machine Learning and Optimization Laboratory that Prof. Peter Richtárik runs. We will continue our work on second-order methods for distributed optimization.

item.title: New paper
item.description: We developed several new second order communication efficient methods with fast rates. Our results are supported with experimental results on real datasets, and show several orders of magnitude improvement on baseline and state-of-the-art methods in terms of communication complexity. You can read it via the link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2102.07158
